QuestData.Title: Ralshiara's Demise
QuestData.Description: It was said in the Journal of the Rising Sun that eating in the mornings cannot be done without harming a few eggs.$b$bThe Bloodmane matron, Ralshiara, feasts upon sacred raven eggs for her snacks. How dare she! She must die for her sins!$b$bTake the path south over the mountains to reach the accursed home of the Bloodmane.$b$bTake this trinket, it fell to us from the heavens as a sign of the Raven Mother's favor and with it you might have a chance.
QuestData.RewardText: Let it be known that on this day the stranger has returned victorious from slaying the feared foe of the Flock!$b$bPraise the Raven Mother!
